testsuite.name: RecipesApplicationTest

testcase.name: start

The JSON object at key ingredients has an incorrect length: should be equal to 3, found 0
Full JSON: { "name": "Warming Ginger Tea /Test", "description": "Ginger tea is a warming drink for cool weather, ... /Test", "ingredients": [], "directions": [], "category": "beverage /Test", "date":
